from sortedcontainers import SortedList 
class Solution:
    def minimumDistance(self, p: List[List[int]]) -> int:
        a = SortedList([])
        b = SortedList([])
        c = SortedList([])
        d = SortedList([])
        for x, y in p:
            a.add(x-y)
            b.add(x+y)
            c.add(-x-y)
            d.add(-x+y) 
        ans = 10**30 
        for x, y in p:
            a.remove(x-y)
            b.remove(x+y)
            c.remove(-x-y)
            d.remove(-x+y) 
            ans = min(ans, max( [a[-1]-a[0], b[-1]-b[0], c[-1]-c[0], d[-1]-d[0]]  )  ) 
            a.add(x-y)
            b.add(x+y)
            c.add(-x-y)
            d.add(-x+y) 
        return ans
